titleStmt.title: A new Yorkshyre song, intituled: Yorke, Yorke, for my monie of all the cities that euer I see, for mery pastime and companie, except the Cittie of London.
titleStmt.author: Elderton, William, d. 1592?

publicationStmt.publisher: By Richard Iones: dwelling neere Holburne Bridge,

notesStmt.note: Signed: From Yorke, by W.E. (i.e. William Elderton).
Verse - "I came thorow the north countrey,".
Reproductions of the original in the British Library.
